verbs.description: After [ARG0: former CIA director John Brennan] [V: penned] [ARG1: a scathing op - ed in The Washington Post attacking President Trump] , the commander - in - chief fired back on Twitter Saturday , citing one of his favorite cable news shows , Fox & Friends .
